__e: I will confess that I got used to seeing him walking on the path beside us.
Now, we are faced with the difficult prospect... of convicting one of our own.
If you see an animal, pass that info up the line to those of us with weapons.
Father, can your troops help us get through the Monkeys to the Magician?
There's something happening in the vampire ranks.
We need police witnesses to offset the damage done to the Department.
